1355400.name: The Line
1355400.description:
The Line is a unique experiment in the field of 3D puzzles.

You control the ball and have to collect all targets on the level to complete it. Sounds easy? Yeah, but the trick is that your every movement leaves a trail behind you. If you touch it you lose. You have to jump, dash and control your speed to find a perfect path that will let you finish the level. But one mistake and you'll start from the beginning. Think, analyze and be quick then you'll succeed.

Unique gameplay

30 levels with brain blowing puzzles

Each level can be solved in dozens ways

Use interactive environment to solve puzzles

Fancy graphics with neon style

Nice sfx and energetic music

Keep track of your game stats

Regular updates with new levels

Test your logic and savvy with this unusual puzzle game! Good luck!
1355400.supported_languages: 英语, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 繁体中文, 韩语, 波兰语, 俄语, 日语
